name: 3 Days (Stephen Montague)
description:
Based on Mars Marine by GameDev.tv
(Unreal Game Dev Blueprints Course),
heavily modded to demo new skills. 

Goal is to survive 3 days,
5 minutes in real time,
if our hero stays alive,
and then, to go home.

===
